brawlers.title: Brawlers
brawlers.intro: We are people of action and we don’t enjoy your fancy words or your fancy magic. Sometimes we are seen fighting one another, but this is how we bond. Who says violence can’t solve all of the problems of the world? We throw everything we have into a problem, sometimes literally. Can I have another ale? What do you mean 5 silver pieces for a pretzel!? I dun mo hau ny...  zzzzz

contact.name: byllenan-stoutale
contact.title: Byllenan Stoutale
contact.description: A kind dwarf who was a Brawler that found herself trapped in Barovia like many other adventurers before her.

beliefs: They get a lot of power from drinking
offences: Going for longer than a day without drinking

skill.title: Heavy Drinker
skill.description: As a bonus action on your turn you can take a swig of an alcoholic drink. Your strikes are now so powerful that you deal an extra 1d6 damage. If you have had more than 2 drinks in this way before a short rest your max health is temporarily lowered by your current level.

luminaries.title: Luminaries
luminaries.intro: We do things with pazazz! Throw in some razzle-dazzle with a sprinkling of funk. We do things in a way that when you hear a song or see a play about the work we have done you will remember our name. We have the largest number of famous members in any faction and that number increases daily. People love us and that is what we hope to keep up going forward.
beliefs: Getting attention is never a bad thing
Everything should be done with pazazz
Try to make everyone like and recognise them
Use their fame (and fortune) to help others
offences: Passing up an opportunity to gain fame

skill.title: Crowd Pleaser
skill.description: For an individual or a group of people you can use your charm and skill to try and impress them, roll a Performance Check, and if they are impressed they will be compelled to tell you the truth and follow your commands for the next hour. You can do this once per long rest.

contact.name: rictavio
contact.title: Rictavio, the storyman
contact.description: A colorfully dressed half-elf bard. He regales tavern patrons with stories so outrageous as to be hardly believable, yet he asserts they are true indeed.

spellworkers.title: Spellworkers
spellworkers.intro: Our faction predates recorded history. We are often called out to investigate cases for people all over this wonderous globe. Since we are in such high demand we only take on interesting cases. We often further the field of magic which has to lead to some of the worlds greatest break-throughs and progressed our understanding of the world further.
beliefs: Use magic and intellect to discern fact

skill.title: Avid Reader
skill.description: You can read spell scrolls from any school of magic without penalty. You can also cast spells from spell scrolls of a level higher than the highest level of your known spells.

contact.name: dathana-mellerelel
contact.title: Dathana Mellerelel
contact.description: A cruel but fair dark elf. She is a powerful mage and knows about every school of magic.

avowed.title: Avowed
avowed.intro: For roughly three hundred we Avowed have lived in Candlekeep. We work to collect and preserve knowledge throughout the known worlds and apply that knowledge diving deep into the depths of the unknown.
offences: No damaging, marking, or otherwise modifying the works

skill.title: Quick Reader
skill.description: You can read and write faster than the average person. What takes someone an hour to read take syou a tenth of the time.

contact.name: pictacus
contact.title: Pictacus
contact.description: A short halfling who knows more about Candlekeep than anyone else

wraithRaiders.title: Wraith Raiders
wraithRaiders.intro: We are the most dangerous and financially successful faction to exist. Our clientele wants us to be discrete and efficient. We are not thieves or murderers, we are problem solvers. Our price may be high but the quality of service is second to none. We do not exist, we are incognito and no one knows our real identities. You do not contact us, we contact you.
beliefs: Sneaking, stealing, killing is not a problem
Never turn down a job or say no
We work outside of the law

skill.title: Pickpocket
skill.description: One per short rest you can perform the pickpocket action. You can sneak up on an unsuspecting character (after a successful Stealth check) then roll a Sleight of Hand. You will then be shared a list of items on that character and you can take one of those items. If the Sleight of Hand is a natural 1 then you are caught.

contact.name: mirapetor-the-fence
contact.title: Mirapetor (a.k.a M)
contact.description: A highly dangerous and devious individual, don't let his tall figure and slow speech fool you, if your name is on his target list it won't be there for long.
